content: विशेष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Peculiar. {@--2@} Copious, abundant; आसीद्विशेषा फलपुष्पवृष्टिः <ls>R. 2. 14.</ls> --षः {@--1@} Discrimination, distinguishing between. {@--2@} Distinction, difference; निर्विशेषो विशेषः <ls>Bh. 3. 50.</ls> {@--3@} Characteristic difference, peculiar mark, special property, speciality, differentia; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> and translated by ‘special’ ‘peculiar’ &c.; <ls>Ś. 6. 5.</ls> {@--4@} A favourable turn or crisis in sickness, a change for the better; अस्ति मे विशेषः <ls>Ś. 3</ls> ‘I feel better’. {@--5@} A limb, member; पुपोष लावण्यमयान् विशेष न् <ls>Ku. 1. 25.</ls> {@--6@} A species, sort, variety, kind, mode (usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); भूतविशेषः <ls>U. 4.</ls> परिमलविशेषान् <ls>Pt. 1</ls>: कदलीविशेषाः <ls>Ku. 1. 36.</ls> {@--7@} A different or various object, various particulars (<ab>pl.</ab>); प्रामादस्त्वां तुलयितुमलं यत्र तैस्तैर्विशेषैः <ls>Me. 64</ls>, <ls n="Me.">57.</ls> {@--8@} Excellence, superiority, distinction; usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> and translated by ‘excellent’, ‘distinguished’, ‘pre-eminent’, ‘choice’, &c.; अनुभावविशेषात्तु <ls>R. 1. 37</ls>; वपुर्विशेषेषु <ls>Ku. 5. 31</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 7</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 5</ls>; <ls>Ki. 9. 58</ls>; so आकृतिविशेषाः ‘excellent forms’, अतिथिविशेषः ‘a distinguished guest’ &c. {@--9@} A peculiar attribute, the eternal distinguishing nature of each of the nine {%dravyas%}; अयमस्माद् व्यावृत्त इति व्यावृत्तिबुद्धिमात्रहंतुर्विशेषः <ls>Tarka K.</ls> (these viśeshas are said to inhere in the atoms of the Earth, Water, Lignt, and Air and the five eternal substances, Ether, Time, Space, Soul and Mind.). {@--10@} ({%a%}) Individuality, particularity. ({%b%}) A particular instance; उक्तिरर्थांतरन्यासः स्यात्सामान्यविशेषयोः. {@--11@} A category, predicament. {@--12@} A mark on the forehead with sandal, saffron &c. {@--13@} A word which limits or qualifies the sense of another; see विशेषण. {@--14@} <ab>N.</ab> of the mundane egg. {@--15@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech, said to be of three kinds; it is thus defined by Mammaṭa: --विना प्रसिद्धमाधारमाधेयस्य व्यवस्थितिः . एकात्मा युगपद्वृत्तिरेकस्मानेकगोच रा . अन्यत्प्रकुर्वतः कार्यमशक्यान्यस्य वस्तुनः . तथैव करणं चेति विशेषस्त्रिविधः स्मृतः .. <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
